stripped_text: Make a run. Trash the first non-agenda card you access during this run at no cost. The Corp can spend credits equal to the rez or play cost of the accessed card to prevent this trash.
text: Make a run. Trash the first non-agenda card you access during this run at no cost. The Corp can spend credits equal to the rez or play cost of the accessed card to prevent this trash.
title: Credit Crash

flavor: "You can have a lot of fun in 23 seconds." -Princess Space Kitten
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The text box of each unique non-region asset and upgrade is blank.
text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The text box of each unique non-region asset and upgrade is blank.
title: Rumor Mill

stripped_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each power counter on it. Interface -> 1click: Break 1 barrier subroutine.
text: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each power counter on it. Interface -> 1[click]: Break 1 barrier subroutine.
title: Nfr

flavor: "It is not wise to call someone crazy until you fully understand what they're trying to say." -Omar Keung
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may install this program from your heap. Xclick: +X strength. Then, if this program can interface with the barrier you are encountering, break up to X subroutines.
text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may install this program from your heap. X[click]: +X strength. Then, if this program can interface with the barrier you are encountering, break up to X subroutines.
title: Paperclip

flavor: The program was as close to a hunting raptor as she could afford...for now.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2click: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 2click: +4 strength. 2click, add this program to your grip: Derez 1 sentry this program fully broke during this encounter.
text: Interface -> 2[click]: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 2[click]: +4 strength. 2[click], add this program to your grip: Derez 1 sentry this program fully broke during this encounter.
title: Golden

stripped_text: Choose a server and place 20 credits from the bank on Temujin Contract when you install it. When there are no credits left on Temujin Contract, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on the chosen server, take 4 credits from Temujin Contract.
text:
Choose a server and place 20[credit] from the bank on Tem端jin Contract when you install it. When there are no credits left on Tem端jin Contract, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on the chosen server, take 4[credit] from Tem端jin Contract.
title: Tem端jin Contract

stripped_text: The first time you pass a piece of ice each turn, you may install an icebreaker from your hand, lowering the install cost by 1.
text: The first time you pass a piece of ice each turn, you may install an icebreaker from your hand, lowering the install cost by 1.
title: Khan: Savvy Skiptracer

flavor: Once a security flaw is identified, there's only a limited window to exploit it before it's patched. Runners call this period "open season."
stripped_text: Make a run on R&D. If successful, you may make another run on R&D when this run ends.
text: Make a run on R&D. If successful, you may make another run on R&D when this run ends.
title: Data Breach

stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move up to 3 credits from your credit pool to Algo Trading. When your turn begins, place 2 credits on Algo Trading from the bank if there are at least 6 credits on it. click,trash: Take all credits from Algo Trading.
text:
When your turn begins, you may move up to 3[credit] from your credit pool to Algo Trading.
When your turn begins, place 2[credit] on Algo Trading from the bank if there are at least 6[credit] on it.
[click],[trash]: Take all credits from Algo Trading.
title: Algo Trading

flavor: "Coming to you live from the front lines, for now, unless they kill me..."
stripped_text: If the Corp has 5-9 credits when your turn begins, gain 1 credit. If the Corp has 10-14 credits when your turn begins, draw 1 card. If the Corp has at least 15 credits when your turn begins, gain click.
text:
If the Corp has 5-9[credit] when your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
If the Corp has 10-14[credit] when your turn begins, draw 1 card.
If the Corp has at least 15[credit] when your turn begins, gain [click].
title: Beth Kilrain-Chang

flavor: To threaten my treasures is to incur my wrath.
stripped_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner must pay 2click or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine The Runner must pay 2click or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage.
text: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[click] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[click] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.
title: Fairchild 2.0

flavor: First, blend with the attacker. Then, control the attack.
stripped_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner draws 2 cards. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
text:
[subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner draws 2 cards.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
title: Aiki

stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trace 3 If successful, trash an installed card that does not match the faction of the Runner's identity.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
<trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, trash an installed card that does not match the faction of the Runner's identity.
title: Enforcing Loyalty

flavor: "SELL!! Buy platinum, but GET OUT OF THE TT CREDIT! It is TOXIC!"
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trace 5 If successful, add an installed non-virtual card to the Runner's grip.
text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Trace 5 If successful, add an installed non-virtual card to the Runner's grip.
title: Hatchet Job

flavor: By the time the report of Emelyov's murder was produced, there had already been a dozen more, hitting all the corps.
stripped_text: Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. Draw that number of cards.
text: Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. Draw that number of cards.
title: Special Report

stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move up to 3 credits from your credit pool to C.I. Fund. When your turn begins, place 2 credits on C.I. Fund from the bank if there are at least 6 credits on it. 2 credits,trash: Take all credits from C.I. Fund.
text:
When your turn begins, you may move up to 3[credit] from your credit pool to C.I. Fund.
When your turn begins, place 2[credit] on C.I. Fund from the bank if there are at least 6[credit] on it.
2[credit],[trash]: Take all credits from C.I. Fund.
title: C.I. Fund

flavor: What's a little insurance fraud between friends?
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trash any number of your rezzed cards and gain 3 credits for each card trashed.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Trash any number of your rezzed cards and gain 3[credit] for each card trashed.
title: Liquidation

stripped_text: The first time each turn an encounter with an advanced piece of ice ends, do 1 meat damage.
text: The first time each turn an encounter with an advanced piece of ice ends, do 1 meat damage.
title: Weyland Consortium: Builder of Nations

flavor: She'd never heard her dads argue like this. Not ever. She'd give anything to make it stop.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner has at least 6 credits. The Runner loses 2 credits for each installed resource. The Runner can trash a resource to prevent this.
text:
Play only if the Runner has at least 6[credit].
The Runner loses 2[credit] for each installed resource. The Runner can trash a resource to prevent this.
title: Financial Collapse

flavor: "While the money pooled at the top, the power went with it, until there were two sets of laws: one for them, one for us" -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
stripped_text: If the Runner accesses Prisec while installed, you may pay 2 credits to give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 meat damage.
text: If the Runner accesses Prisec while installed, you may pay 2[credit] to give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 meat damage.
title: Prisec
